1.12.1.6:
- add disenchanting-sound
- disenchanting now reverts the repair-cost by halving it each iteration
- rework of source code for disenchanting
- fix machine multiplier being applied with normal disenchantment tables
- fix potential conflicts with item- and blockmodels

- add `Jar of Experience` which can be used to convert enchantments into experience, add upgrades for this jar

- switch to Forge's capability-, annotation-based configuration- and updater-systems
- switch to Minecraft's new recipe- and advancement-system, making recipes customizable
- add options to disable certain items and enchantments from being used

- add options to configure position and visibility (flipped, invisible) of the book above the disenchantment table
- add option to show the upgrades of the table when viewing the GUI
- fix enchantment-loss, not it's actually usable
- fix issues related to disenchantment tables with custom names
- fix item duplication in a better, more permanent way, therefore enabling dropping of items from the GUI again
- fix items with no durability being destroyed
- fix issues related to automatic disenchantment table
